name: IntrauterineDevicesICD10CMProvisionEncounters
title: Intrauterine Devices ICD10CM Provision Encounters
description: For Contraceptive eCQMs Approval for Trial Use application in Spring 2022; includes copper and hormonal
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family planning - provision and use of most and moderately effective contraceptive methods, access to long-acting reversible contraception (LARC)),(Data Element Scope: Diagnosis codes indicating prescription or provision of intrauterine devices or systems (IUDs or IUSs), a most effective method of contraception),(Inclusion Criteria: Diagnosis codes indicating prescription or provision of intrauterine devices or systems (IUDs or IUSs), a most effective method of contraception),(Exclusion Criteria: Any contraceptive method that is not an IUD or IUS; Most effective (i.e., sterilization, contraceptive implants) or moderately effective (i.e., injectables, oral pills, patch, or ring) methods of contraception; Less effective methods of contraception (i.e., diaphragm, male condom, female condom, withdrawal, sponge, fertility-awareness based methods, spermicide))
